quest.name: Electric Gunduloo
journal:
Muna Vanu would have you assist his tribesmen.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

Muna Vanu tells you that Linu Vanu has been seeking you, with an aim to enlisting your assistance. Speak with him and find out what he needs help with.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

You learn that the Vundu are training strong and skilled warriors whose prowess in the Vanu Vanu sundrop dance grows more daunting by the day. He bids you seek these threats out, and intimidate them with your own rendition of the dance, that they might lose faith and abandon their training.

You awe the young Vundu dancers with your impeccable dancing capabilities. Not one of the warriors holds his ground before your terrifying display. Report back to Linu Vanu and tell him that the Vundu whelps have been put in their place.

Linu Vanu is greatly relieved to hear that the Vundu dancers have been dealt with before they could pose a real and certain threat to the safety of his people. While thankful that his tribe has your strength to draw on, he resolves to also work on refining his own dancing abilities, to better serve in his tribe's protection.
objectives: Overwhelm the Vundu dancers with the /sundropdance.

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Greetings, Forename! Linu Vanu searches for you!

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: No doubt he wishes to ask netherling's help. Please seek Linu Vanu, and find out what he wants.

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: How fortunate─just as Linu Vanu seeks Forename, shehe arrives! I wish to borrow skills of netherling that perfected mighty sundrop dance!

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: We hear rumors that the Vundu train powerful warriors, whose command of sundrop dance rivals even our greatest dancers. This must not be! This menace must be stopped before it grows too strong.

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: Please seek out Vundu dancers and show them full glory of Gundu sundrop dance. Make them know folly of daring to eclipse us!

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: Go to Vundu village! Show them mighty sundrop dance and let them cower, like new-hatched nestlings trembling before booming thunderstorm!

dialogue.name: VUNDU02198
dialogue.text: This is Vundu land─begone! Netherling like you has no right to stand before mighty Vundu sundrop dancer!

dialogue.name: VUNDU02198
dialogue.text: Wh-What!? Mere netherling masters sundrop dance!? HerHis piercing gaze, sharper than claws of fiercest anzu... HerHis commanding presence, overpowering like devastating gale...

dialogue.name: VUNDU02198
dialogue.text: I can stand it no longer!

dialogue.name: VUNDU02198
dialogue.text: Hmph! What brings netherling to Ok' Vundu? Foolish thing like you─who knows not even the sundrop dance─is not safe here.

dialogue.name: VUNDU02198
dialogue.text: But─but netherlings cannot perform so flawless a dance! It is not possible!

dialogue.name: VUNDU02198
dialogue.text: HerHis style is impetuous! HerHis defense is impregnable! I must retreat!

dialogue.name: VUNDU02198
dialogue.text: Netherling approaches, but does not attack? Does shehe plan to challenge great Vundu with sundrop dance!?

dialogue.name: VUNDU02198
dialogue.text: Such masterful dancing. I cannot believe it! Its power washes over me like endless torrent from vast waterfall!

dialogue.name: VUNDU02198
dialogue.text: I cannot suffer this to be! Rage wells within me like great blazing furnace! Wait here, netherling! I return with most monstrous weapons I own and destroy you!

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: Word spreads fast, Forename─faster than herd of frightened dhalmels. Linu Vanu hears of netherling's victory over Vundu savages!

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: Through netherling's unrivaled power, Vundu threat is quashed before it can cause us real problems.

dialogue.name: LINUVANU
dialogue.text: You have Linu Vanu's thanks, Forename, and thanks of whole Gundu tribe. Linu Vanu fears even he might not stand up to netherling's fearsome sundrop dance... He must practice dancing himself, he thinks.
